His attire, often a simple shirt and overalls rendered with Apple‚Äôs signature smooth gradients and soft rounded edges, suggests a connection to the earth.  This emoji on Apple devices embodies hard work, nature, and agricultural pursuits, often used to signify growing, harvesting, or a connection to rural life.
